snippet.title: Roguebook -  Creative Director Interview + Richard Garfield
snippet.description:
Enjoy a recap from #NaconConnect of the CEO and Creative Director at Abrakam Studios, Jean-Michel Vilain as he takes you through the wonderful world of @playRoguebook.

Also hear the thoughts of the legendary Richard Garfield (creator of Magic the Gathering) who is a co-designer on the game!

Follow Roguebook on socials;
Twitter.com/PlayRoguebook
Facebook.com/PlayRoguebook

-------------------------------
For news about our other games and products, you can also follow us on: 

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/NaconGames
Twitter ►https://twitter.com/Nacon
